scripts.lint: eslint db imageResizer scripts server shared client infra cypress --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx
scripts.integration: COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=cd_test docker-compose -f docker-compose.integration.yml run api yarn integration
scripts.regression: COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=regression docker-compose -f docker-compose.regression.yml run --rm e2e yarn test
scripts.unit: COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=cd_unit docker-compose -f docker-compose.unit.yml run client yarn test
scripts.e2e: COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=cd_e2e docker-compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml run --rm cypress yarn cypress run
scripts.test: yarn build && yarn unit && yarn integration && yarn e2e && yarn stop
scripts.ci: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn test && ./scripts/development/buildForDeploy.sh
